00200 
00201 inline const SearchMapRegionIterator
00202 SearchMapRegionTable::begin(uint32 idx) const
00203 {
00204    return &m_allRegions[getOffset(idx)];
00205 }
00206 
00207 inline const SearchMapRegionIterator
00208 SearchMapRegionTable::end(uint32 idx) const
00209 {
00210    return &(begin(idx)[getNbrRegions(idx)]);
00211 }
00212 
00213 inline uint32
00214 SearchMapRegionTable::getRegion(int nbr, uint32 idx)
00215 {
00216    return begin(idx)[nbr];
00217 }
